<p>Hi 👋, I am <a href='https://twitter.com/plopix' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Plopix-black?style=flat-square&logo=twitter' alt='Plopix'/></a><a href='https://linkedin.com/in/sebastienmorel' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Sebastien Morel-black?style=flat-square&logo=linkedin' alt='Sebastien Morel'/></a>, I am CTO at <a target='_blank' href='https://almaviacx.com' title='Almavia CX'>Almavia CX</a> by <a target='_blank' href='https://www.nextedia.com' title='Nextedia'>Nextedia</a>. I live in California, and I come from France 🥖.</p><p>🦚 proud maintainer or co-maintainer on those projects: <a href="https://plopix.github.io/" title="">https://plopix.github.io/</a>.

💯 my favorite technologies: <a href='https://www.php.net' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/PHP-7.4-green?style=flat-square&logo=php&labelColor=black' alt='PHP - 7.4'/></a> <a href='https://symfony.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Symfony-5.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=symfony&labelColor=black' alt='Symfony - 5.x'/></a>, often, I base my developments on top of <a href='https://ezplatform.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/eZ Platform-3.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&labelColor=black' alt='eZ Platform - 3.x'/></a> <a href='https://contentful.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Contentful-black?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,' alt='Contentful'/></a>.</p><p>🚀 I always push to ship on <a href='https://platorm.sh' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Platform.sh-black?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,' alt='Platform.sh'/></a>, but we have some projects on <a href='https://aws.amazon.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/AWS-black?style=flat-square&logo=amazon-aws' alt='AWS'/></a>.</p><p>🐳 and for local developments that's of course <a href='https://docker.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Docker-black?style=flat-square&logo=docker' alt='Docker'/></a>.</p><p>🧰 my toolbox is my <a href='https://www.mysql.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/MySQL-8.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=mysql&labelColor=black' alt='MySQL - 8.x'/></a> <a href='https://www.mongodb.com/' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/MongoDB-4.x-green?style=flat-square&logo=mongodb&labelColor=black' alt='MongoDB - 4.x'/></a>, <a href='https://redislabs.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Redis-black?style=flat-square&logo=redis' alt='Redis'/></a>, <a href='https://www.elastic.co' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/ElasticSearch-black?style=flat-square&logo=elasticsearch' alt='ElasticSearch'/></a> <a href='https://lucene.apache.org/solr' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Solr-black?style=flat-square&logo=apache-solr' alt='Solr'/></a>, <a href='https://algolia.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Algolia-black?style=flat-square&logo=algolia' alt='Algolia'/></a> all the time with <a href='https://varnish-cache.org' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Varnish-black?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/png;base64,' alt='Varnish'/></a>.</p><p>🧪 for CI, it's <a href='https://git-scm.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Git-black?style=flat-square&logo=git' alt='Git'/></a> <a href='https://github.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Github-black?style=flat-square&logo=github' alt='Github'/></a> and <a href='https://travis-ci.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Travis-black?style=flat-square&logo=travis' alt='Travis'/></a>. More and more <a href='https://github.com/features/actions' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Github Actions-black?style=flat-square&logo=github-actions' alt='Github Actions'/></a>. Occasionnaly <a href='https://gitlab.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Gitlab-black?style=flat-square&logo=gitlab' alt='Gitlab'/></a> <a href='https://bitbucket.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Bitbucket-black?style=flat-square&logo=bitbucket' alt='Bitbucket'/></a>.

🌉 When it comes to <a href='https://www.w3.org/html' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/HTML-black?style=flat-square&logo=html5' alt='HTML'/></a>  <a href='https://www.w3.org/Style/CSS/specs.en.html' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/CSS-black?style=flat-square&logo=css3' alt='CSS'/></a>, I use <a href='https://www.typescriptlang.org' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-black?style=flat-square&logo=typescript' alt='TypeScript'/></a> <a href='https://www.w3schools.com/js/js_es6.asp' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Javascript-ES6-green?style=flat-square&logo=javascript&labelColor=black' alt='Javascript - ES6'/></a> on top of <a href='https://reactjs.org' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/React JS-black?style=flat-square&logo=react' alt='React JS'/></a> with<a href='https://getbootstrap.com' target='_blank'><img src='https://img.shields.io/badge/Bootstrap-black?style=flat-square&logo=bootstrap' alt='Bootstrap'/></a>.
</p>
